name: Merrell Moab Adventure Lace Shoes - Men's
description: Get off the beaten path without looking like a tourist. The Moab is particularly great for multi-stop travel adventures, holding its own on all-day wanders on cobblestone streets, hours-long museum tours and even a rough trail or two. Handsome leather upper, lugged Vibram outsole for good traction, and an anti-microbial footbed keep you in it for the long haul.Nubuck upper with mesh panels combines durability and breathability.Stout rubber toecap.Comfy EVA footbed sports an antimocrobial treatment.Nylon shank under arch provides support and protection on uneven surfaces.Lugged Vibram outsole provides reliable traction across a wide range of terrain and temperatures.
